column5: Hello everybody:  I've been surfing OFC for a while, but have finally made an account!  I'm from Richmond Hill and big largemouth are my main target.  I also work at Le Baron, so if there's ever a question about product availability, pricing or feedback I've heard, I'd be glad to help.  I just wanted to introduce myself, and I look working to talking with all of you!  -ADB.
Glad to have you along ADB. Welcome!
Welcome to OFC ADB You won't regret it.... best site on the planet!! Leechman
Welcome aboard ADB. Went to Le Barons on Saturday, got a nice reel!
Welcome to the board!  Glad to see you lurked for a bit and decided to jump in!  Looking forward to your reports when all this hard water is gone.
Welcome ADB.  Which LeBaron do you work at?  I use the Mississauga store more than a few times a year.
Welcome aboard!! I go to LeBaron all the time!! You'd probably recognize my face if you saw my profile!
When are you guys getting more pinkies , LOL  !!!!
Which LeBaron location do you work at BTW?  EDIT: I just realized you live in Richmond Hill; Ignore this question. I've only been to that location 3x.
Thanks for the welcomes.  Yup, I work at the Markham location.  JDMLS, not sure what you mean by:

I'm thinkin JDMLS is talkin' about pink trout worms for steelheading...I made sure to nab a whole wack of them in december when they were still in stock @ BPS...    I've got the regular soft plastics and picked up some of the gulp worms to try out...  welcome to the board ADB

Oh...the Berkley Trout Worms.  Yeah, the pink/bubblegum always do sell out fast.  I think all we've got at the moment is natural and chartreuse.  With spring steelhead coming up we'll be getting some in stock soon enough, though.
So, I'm guessing it's a staff discount for all of us? Welcome.
